title: ninaittapOdu nI
sahitya:
ninaittapOdu nI vara vENDum nIla ezhimaiyinil mEghamadE vElA


anupallavi

  unaiyE ninaindu uruguginrEnE uNarndiDum aDiyAr uLam uraivOnE


caraNam    kaliyuga deivam kandA nIyE karuNaiyin viLakkamum kaDambA nIyE
malai ena tuyargaL vaLarndiDum pOdil mAyOn marugA murugA enrE
